verses.text_uthmani: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

translations.text: Blessed is the One in Whose Hands rests all authority. And He is Most Capable of everything.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabaraka allathee biyadihialmulku wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ

translations.text: ˹He is the One˺ Who created death and life in order to test which of you is best in deeds. And He is the Almighty, All-Forgiving.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee khalaqa almawta walhayataliyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu AAamalan wahuwa alAAazeezualghafoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ

translations.text: ˹He is the One˺ Who created seven heavens, one above the other. You will never see any imperfection in the creation of the Most Compassionate.<sup foot_note=77529>1</sup> So look again: do you see any flaws?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee khalaqa sabAAa samawatintibaqan ma tara fee khalqi arrahmanimin tafawutin farjiAAi albasara hal taramin futoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ

translations.text: Then look again and again—your sight will return frustrated and weary.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma irjiAAi albasara karratayniyanqalib ilayka albasaru khasi-an wahuwa haseer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

translations.text: And indeed, We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps, and made them ˹as missiles˺ for stoning ˹eavesdropping˺ devils, for whom We have also prepared the torment of the Blaze.<sup foot_note=77530>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad zayyanna assamaaaddunya bimasabeeha wajaAAalnaharujooman lishshayateeni waaAAtadna lahumAAathaba assaAAeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

translations.text: Those who disbelieve in their Lord will suffer the punishment of Hell. What an evil destination!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walillatheena kafaroo birabbihim AAathabujahannama wabi/sa almaseer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ

translations.text: When they are tossed into it, they will hear its roaring as it boils over,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha olqoo feeha samiAAoo lahashaheeqan wahiya tafoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ

translations.text: almost bursting in fury. Every time a group is cast into it, its keepers will ask them, “Did a warner not come to you?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Takadu tamayyazu mina alghaythikullama olqiya feeha fawjun saalahum khazanatuhaalam ya/tikum natheer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ

translations.text: They will reply, “Yes, a warner did come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has revealed nothing. You are extremely astray.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bala qad jaananatheerun fakaththabna waqulna manazzala Allahu min shay-in in antum illa fee dalalinkabeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

translations.text: And they will lament, “If only we had listened and reasoned, we would not be among the residents of the Blaze!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo law kunna nasmaAAu awnaAAqilu ma kunna fee as-habi assaAAeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

translations.text: And so they will confess their sins. So away with the residents of the Blaze!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaAAtarafoo bithanbihim fasuhqanli-as-habi assaAAeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ

translations.text: Indeed, those in awe of their Lord without seeing Him<sup foot_note=77531>1</sup> will have forgiveness and a mighty reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena yakhshawna rabbahumbilghaybi lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translations.text: Whether you speak secretly or openly—He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahuAAaleemun bithati assudoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ

translations.text: How could He not know His Own creation? For He ˹alone˺ is the Most Subtle, All-Aware.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ala yaAAlamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefualkhabeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

translations.text: He is the One Who smoothed out the earth for you, so move about in its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection ˹of all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Huwa allathee jaAAala lakumu al-ardathaloolan famshoo fee manakibihawakuloo min rizqihi wa-ilayhi annushoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ

translations.text: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aamintum man fee assama-i anyakhsifa bikumu al-arda fa-itha hiya tamoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ

translations.text: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones. Only then would you know how ˹serious˺ My warning was!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am amintum man fee assama-ian yursila AAalaykum hasiban fasataAAlamoona kayfa natheer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

translations.text: And certainly those before them denied ˹as well˺, then how severe was My response!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad kaththaba allatheenamin qablihim fakayfa kana nakeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ

translations.text: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yaraw ila attayrifawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna mayumsikuhunna illa arrahmanu innahubikulli shay-in baseer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ

translations.text: Also, which ˹powerless˺ force will come to your help instead of the Most Compassionate? Indeed, the disbelievers are only ˹lost˺ in delusion.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman hatha allathee huwajundun lakum yansurukum min dooni arrahmaniini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ

translations.text: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion ˹to the truth˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman hatha allatheeyarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.text: Who is ˹rightly˺ guided: the one who crawls facedown or the one who walks upright on the Straight Path?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaman yamshee mukibban AAala wajhihiahda amman yamshee sawiyyan AAala siratinmustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is the One Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul huwa allathee anshaakum wajaAAalalakumu assamAAa wal-absara wal-af-idataqaleelan ma tashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ

translations.text: ˹Also˺ say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul huwa allathee tharaakumfee al-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only sent with a clear warning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahiwa-innama ana natheerun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

translations.text: Then when they see the torment drawing near, the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy, and it will be said ˹to them˺, “This is what you claimed would never come.”<sup foot_note=77532>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma raawhu zulfatan see-atwujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allatheekuntum bihi taddaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Consider this: whether Allah causes me and those with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”<sup foot_note=77533>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahuwaman maAAiya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireenamin AAathabin aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate—in Him ˹alone˺ we believe, and in Him ˹alone˺ we trust. You will soon know who is clearly astray.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul huwa arrahmanu amannabihi waAAalayhi tawakkalna fasataAAlamoona man huwa fee dalalinmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ

translations.text: Say, “Consider this: if your water were to sink ˹into the earth˺, then who ˹else˺ could bring you flowing water?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul araaytum in asbaha maokumghawran faman ya/teekum bima-in maAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
